Filter.Name: MsgDimensioned
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'MESSAGE*' AND UNDIMENSIONED IS NULL

Filter.Name: ValveEndNotFlange
Filter.Value: (Type LIKE 'VALVE*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*') AND (End1 <> 'FL' OR END2 <> 'FL')

Filter.Name: OletAndServiceDrAvCvOrRv
Filter.Value: Type='Olet' AND (Service = 'DR' OR Service = 'AV' OR Service = 'CV' OR Service = 'RV')

Filter.Name: Components
Filter.Value: (FieldItem) OR ((Type LIKE 'VALVE*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*') AND (End1='FL' OR End2='FL')) OR ((Type='Pipe' OR Type='Pipe-Fixed') AND Length=MaxPipeLength) OR (Type='REFERENCE-DIMENSION')

Filter.Name: Components_MaxPipeLengthSegmentsAsSpools
Filter.Value: (FieldItem) OR ((Type LIKE 'VALVE*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*') AND End1='FL')

Filter.Name: BOMFitting
Filter.Value: NOT (Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Gasket' OR Type = 'REINFORCEMENT-PAD' OR Type = 'Flange' OR Type = 'Bolt' OR Type LIKE 'Valve*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*' OR Type = 'Olet' OR Type LIKE 'Instrument*' OR Type = 'Support')

Filter.Name: Fitting
Filter.Value: NOT (Type = 'REFERENCE-DIMENSION' OR Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Gasket' OR Type = 'REINFORCEMENT-PAD' OR Type = 'Flange' OR Type = 'Bolt' OR Type LIKE 'Valve*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*' OR Type = 'Olet' OR Type LIKE 'Instrument*' OR Type = 'Support' OR Type LIKE 'Elbow*' OR Type LIKE 'Cross*' OR Type LIKE '*Weld' OR Type = 'Glued' OR Type = 'Thread' OR Type LIKE 'Tee*' OR Type LIKE 'Y-*' OR Type = 'FLOOR-SYMBOL' OR Type = 'FLOW-ARROW')

Filter.Name: FittingAndInstrument
Filter.Value: NOT (Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Gasket' OR Type = 'REINFORCEMENT-PAD' OR Type = 'Flange' OR Type = 'Bolt' OR Type LIKE 'Valve*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*' OR Type = 'Olet' OR Type = 'Support')

Filter.Name: VentDrainStart
Filter.Value: ((Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Coupling') AND ConnectionSize > 0 AND ConnectionSize <= 2) OR Type = 'Olet'

Filter.Name: PipeBasedComponent
Filter.Value: Type = 'Elbow' OR Type LIKE '*Tee' OR Type LIKE 'CROSS*'

Filter.Name: SpecBreakItems
Filter.Value: Type <> 'FLOW-ARROW' AND Type <> 'BOLT' AND Type NOT LIKE '*Weld' AND NOT (Type='support')

Filter.Name: InsulationLimitItems
Filter.Value: Type <> 'FLOW-ARROW' AND Type <> 'BOLT' AND Type NOT LIKE '*Weld' AND Type <> 'support' AND Type = 'EndConnection'

Filter.Name: NotBoltWeldFlangeGasket
Filter.Value: Type <> 'BOLT' AND Type NOT LIKE '*Weld' AND Type NOT LIKE '*Flange' AND NOT(Type='Gasket')

Filter.Name: OletAndSkeyLascLaswOrLabw
Filter.Value: Type = 'olet' AND (SKEY='LASC' OR SKEY='LASW' OR SKEY='LABW')

Filter.Name: PartFitting
Filter.Value: Type NOT LIKE '*Weld' AND Type <> 'EndConnection' AND Type NOT LIKE 'END-*' AND Type <> 'PIPE' AND Type <> 'Pipe-Fixed' AND Type <> 'FLANGE' AND Type <> 'GASKET' AND Type <> 'BOLT' AND TYPE NOT LIKE 'INSTRUMENT*'

Filter.Name: PartFittingAndInstrument
Filter.Value: Type NOT LIKE '*Weld' AND Type <> 'EndConnection' AND Type NOT LIKE 'END-*' AND Type <> 'PIPE' AND Type <> 'Pipe-Fixed' AND Type <> 'FLANGE' AND Type <> 'GASKET' AND Type <> 'BOLT'

Filter.Name: ValveOperatorSkewed
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'VALVE*' AND NOT (DIRECTION IS NULL OR DIRECTION='UP' OR DIRECTION='DOWN' OR DIRECTION='EAST' OR DIRECTION='NORTH' OR DIRECTION='SOUTH' OR DIRECTION='WEST')

Filter.Name: ValveOperatorPrimary
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'VALVE*' AND (DIRECTION='UP' OR DIRECTION='DOWN' OR DIRECTION='EAST' OR DIRECTION='NORTH' OR DIRECTION='SOUTH' OR DIRECTION='WEST')

Filter.Name: PipeElbowTeeOrCross
Filter.Value: Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Elbow' OR TYPE = 'Tee' OR Type = 'Cross' OR Type = 'Bend'

Filter.Name: NotPipeElbowTeeOrCross
Filter.Value: NOT (Type = 'Pipe' OR Type = 'Pipe-Fixed' OR Type = 'Elbow' OR TYPE = 'Tee' OR Type = 'Cross' OR Type = 'Bend')

Filter.Name: AnnoMsgInsulationOrFlowArrow
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'Annotation*' OR Type LIKE 'Message*' OR Type = 'INSULATION-SYMBOL' OR Type = 'FLOW-ARROW'

Filter.Name: WeldLayer
Filter.Value: Type LIKE '*Weld' OR Type = 'Thread' OR Type = 'Glued' OR SchemeName = 'FieldWeld' OR SchemeName = 'FieldFitWeld'

Filter.Name: WeldEnd1NullOrBw
Filter.Value: Type LIKE '*Weld' AND (End1 IS NULL OR End1 = 'BW' OR End1 = 'SO')

Filter.Name: ValveVentService
Filter.Value: (Type LIKE 'VALVE*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*') AND (SERVICE = 'AV' OR SERVICE = 'CV' OR SERVICE = 'RV')

Filter.Name: ValveDrainService
Filter.Value: (Type LIKE 'VALVE*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*') AND SERVICE = 'DR'

FieldFilter.Name: Existing
FieldFilter.Template: Existing = 'true' OR (NOT STATUS IS NULL AND STATUS = '{0}')

Filter.Name: NotAnnoMsgInsulationOrFlowArrow
Filter.Value: NOT (Type LIKE 'Annotation*' OR Type LIKE 'Message*' OR Type = 'INSULATION-SYMBOL' OR Type = 'FLOW-ARROW' OR TYPE LIKE '*Dimension')

Filter.Name: CutbackElbow
Filter.Value: (Type = 'Elbow' OR Type='Bend') AND NOT ANGLE IS NULL AND [ANGLE-CDEG] <> 9000 AND [ANGLE-CDEG] <> 18000 AND [ANGLE-CDEG] <> 4500 AND [ANGLE-CDEG] <> 13500

Filter.Name: FittingToFitting
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'Reducer*' OR Type='CAP' OR Type='PLUG' OR Type = 'Gasket' OR Type = 'Flange' OR Type = 'Bolt' OR Type='COUPLING' OR Type LIKE 'Valve*' OR Type LIKE 'MPV*' OR Type = 'Olet' OR Type LIKE 'Instrument*' OR Type LIKE 'Tee*' OR Type LIKE 'Elbow*' OR Type LIKE 'Cross*' OR Type LIKE '*Weld' OR Type LIKE 'END-POSITION-*'

Filter.Name: FittingToFittingEndPoint
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'Tee*' OR Type LIKE 'Elbow*' OR Type LIKE 'Cross*' OR Type='CAP' OR Type='PLUG' OR Type LIKE 'END-POSITION-*'

Filter.Name: InsulationShowFor
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'Pipe*' OR Type LIKE 'Elbow*' OR Type LIKE 'Bend*' OR Type LIKE 'Cross*' OR Type='Olet' OR Type LIKE 'Tee*'

Filter.Name: ContinuationMultiPortValve
Filter.Value: Type LIKE 'MPV*' OR (Type='EndConnection' AND MPVLEVEL IS NOT NULL)
